bibl.title: Notationes legentis. 61-68.

series.title: Bulletin of the American Society of Papyrologists
BASP

bibl.note: 61. P. Tebt. I, 8. - 62. P. Cair. Isidor. 105. - 63. P. Coll. Youtie II, 74. - 64. The term of office of the magistracies (archai) of the third and fourth century metropoleis. - 65. P. Oxy. IX, 1187. In or soon after A.D. 245, the administration of Roman Egypt underwent a wideranging reorganization. The term "to apotakton" refers to that reorganized system. - 66. Remarks about P. Oxy. XLIII, 3097, a liturgist's oath of office (A.D. 224/5). - 67. P. Brem. 38. - 68. P. Ryl. II, 88.
